verses.verse: A Song of Ascents; of David. I was glad <S%H8055><s%> when they said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H3212><s%>, Let us go unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Our feet <S%H7272><s%> are standing <S%H5975><s%> Within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, O Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>,
Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, that art builded <S%H1129><s%> As a city <S%H5892><s%> that is compact <S%H2266><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>;

Whither <S%H8033><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> go up <S%H5927><s%>, even the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>, For an ordinance <S%H5715><s%> for Israel <S%H3478><s%>, To give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
For there are set <S%H3427><s%> thrones <S%H3678><s%> for judgment <S%H4941><s%>, The thrones <S%H3678><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>.
Pray <S%H7592><s%> for the peace <S%H7965><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: They shall prosper <S%H7951><s%> that love thee <S%H157><s%>.
Peace <S%H7965><s%> be within thy walls <S%H2426><s%>, And prosperity <S%H7962><s%> within thy palaces <S%H759><s%>.
For my brethren <S%H251><s%> and companions <S%H7453><s%>' sakes <S%H1696><s%>, I will now say, Peace be within thee <S%H7965><s%>.
For the sake of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> I will seek <S%H1245><s%> thy good <S%H2896><s%>.
